channel.title: Sidebar Icons all over the place
channel.description: So the other day I changed my sprites through the cache since I decided to make a V.2 of my current server, so I changed the gameframe but the sidebar icons aren't in their right positions, if anyone could help me it'd be great I know it has something to do with client.java client sided of course :P I know there's a piece of code you have to put unfortunately I don't know it, so yeah if someone could help me out that'd be great! :) Here's how they look right now >.< [IMG]http://i1064.photobucket.com/albums/u380/ScapeRune_rsps/0001-1.png[/img]

item.title: Sidebar Icons all over the place

drawSideIcons?

if not

Search ““sideicons”” and see what it requesting them from the cache (Forget non renamed name)

item.title: Sidebar Icons all over the place
item.dc:creator: @r0m3r0 r0m3r0
item.description:
@r0m3r0 wrote:

Yeah sorry about that misleading title, uhm… do you think you could give me 1 of the pieces of the code that deals with that? cause they should be all together.

Read full topic
item.source: Sidebar Icons all over the place

item.title: Sidebar Icons all over the place
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

They’re not “all over the place”. They are exactly where one would expect them to be. The problem here is that the client uses absolute positioning with the icons, and that positioning was based on the 317-377 gameframe. Changing the gameframe therefor skews where one would expect them to be.

The solution is go into the client, and change where the icons are drawn. Should be near where they are created.

Read full topic
item.source: Sidebar Icons all over the place
